Title: 50% Deployment Time Reduction
Description: Streamlines information architecture development process to reduce deployment time by 50% or more.

Title: Activity Logs
Description: Activity logging system that allows for team collaboration and tracking of changes.

Title: Adaptable Business Requirements
Description: Easily adaptable to changing business requirements without extensive reconfiguration.

Title: Automated IA Building
Description: Automates the complex and time-intensive task of building and maintaining a robust information architecture.

Title: Central Reporting
Description: Centralized reporting capabilities to track and monitor information architecture activities.

Title: Centralized Information Architecture Management
Description: Single-interface solution for creating and maintaining information architecture for SharePoint Online in one central location.

Title: Code-Free UI-Driven Application
Description: User-friendly interface that eliminates the need for SharePoint developers to build and maintain information architecture.

Title: Compliance Management Support
Description: Enables compliance management through structured information architecture.

Title: Content Findability Enhancement
Description: Strong foundation for content findability to help employees locate needed information.

Title: Content Lifecycle Management
Description: Enables sustainable content lifecycle management through proper information architecture.

Title: Design Consistency Enforcement
Description: Ensures consistency of design across entire SharePoint Online environment through centralized controls.

Title: Error-Free Deployments
Description: Ensures that information architecture deployments are implemented correctly through testing and validation.

Title: Governance Support
Description: Promotes good governance practices through strong information architecture foundation.

Title: HELUX Blueprint Integration
Description: Integrates with HELUX Blueprint comprehensive content migration methodology.

Title: Microsoft App Store Availability
Description: Available for purchase and download from the Microsoft App Store for self-service deployment.

Title: Records Management Foundation
Description: Provides foundation for effective records management practices within SharePoint Online.

Title: Reusable Components
Description: Enables creation of reusable building blocks to ensure consistency of design across SharePoint Online.

Title: Sandbox Testing
Description: Iterative sandbox testing environment to ensure information architecture deployments are implemented correctly every time.

Title: SharePoint Online Integration
Description: Native integration with SharePoint Online to manage structure and publishing experience.

Title: Site Creation Automation
Description: Automated site creation capabilities for SharePoint Online based on defined templates and structures.

Title: Site Maintenance Tools
Description: Tools for ongoing maintenance of SharePoint sites from a central interface.

Title: Step-by-Step Workflow
Description: Guided workflow that makes it easy to collaborate during building, testing and deployment of information architecture.

Title: THEMIS ICE Integration
Description: Works in conjunction with THEMIS ICE intelligent content migration solution.

Title: Team Collaboration
Description: Built-in collaboration features that enable teams to work together on information architecture development.

Title: Temporary Site Creation
Description: Ability to create temporary sites from a single design to ensure consistency across SharePoint Online.

Title: User Adoption Support
Description: Features designed to promote user adoption of SharePoint Online through intuitive information architecture.
